chapter.remark: WRITER INSTRUCTIONS: Follow the instructions in the &AWS; Style Guide at Writing About Concepts. This is an example where the XML root element is a chapter (!DOCTYPE chapter). If you want this XML file to be a section that you include in a chapter, change !DOCTYPE chapter to !DOCTYPE section, change <chapter role="topic" id="concept-chapter-servicename"> to <section role="topic" id="concept-section-servicename">, change <chapterinfo> to <sectioninfo>, and insert an <xi:include href="sectionFilename.xml"/> tag in the chapter XML file where you want to include the section. Remove this remark before using this template code in your doc package. Rename file to keyword.xml, where the file name keyword reflects the concepts covered in this chapter.
